article: Driving to a store after a busy day at work, I saw a man standing near the store holding a sign that said, "Will work for food." I knew at that moment that I was going into the store and _ him something to eat. As I turned into the car park, I saw in my car mirror a lady come out from a hairdresser's and _ the man. I thought she must be going to give him some _ or something to help him out. In the store I was _ to get the things I needed and also the chicken dinner and a soda that I wanted to give the man outside. I hurried out to my car and _ that I was going to be able to hopefully help this man. When I drove out of the car park, I couldn't see the _ . As I turned the corner I saw the man sitting in a _ area away from the hairdresser's and still _ up the sign. I immediately _ over and gave the man the dinner and soda and said, " _ this will get you through today." He looked at me and said, "Thank you so much!" As I got back into my car, I looked in the _ and saw the man swallowing the dinner as if he hadn't eaten for days. I was so _ that I was able to help him and at the same time I was so sad that the woman from the hairdresser's, _ , had asked the man to _ from her shop. It's sad to say that _ I live in a small city where homeless is not as _ as in larger cities, people are uncomfortable with these people in _ .
